titles.title: To amend the Federal Reserve Act to require the production of Federal reserve notes in a manner which enables an individual who is blind to determine the denomination of each such note, and for other purposes.
Catherine Skivers Currency for All Act
Catherine Skivers Currency for All Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy, Trade, and Technology.

bill.summary: Catherine Skivers Currency for All Act - Amends the Federal Reserve Act to require each federal reserve note whose denomination is $50 or less to be trimmed in a prescribed manner so as to make the denomination recognizable to an individual who is blind.
